title.rendered: Genuine Samsung Type C Cable, Official Samsung Type C USB-C Fast Charge & Sync Data Cable For Samsung Galaxy A50, A50s…

content.rendered:
(*1*)

Samsung EP-DG950CBE Fast Charger Type-C Cable 1.2M (EP-DG950CBE) is an official Samsung product made out of the best high quality supplies and to the strictest requirements. This is right as a spare or substitute in your present Type-C charging cable. It is suitable with Type-C port units.Genuine Samsung Accessory Type-C USB Cable EP-DG950CBE Charge your cellphone from a wall outlet by way of Cable.The USB-C/Type C cable can be utilized to fast-charge your cell phone, pill and different Type C units. As a added bonus we’re additionally offering in this package deal a MOBACE 2 in 1 Stylus Pen. Box Contains :- Genuine Samsung Cable & MOBACE 2 in 1 Stylus Pen

Genuine Samsung Type C Cable – Genuine Samsung Type C Cable with Reversible Connector you possibly can cost and sync your new Android cellphone to retain speedy speeds, excessive energy output, and at all times a dependable cost. The USB-C cable can be utilized to fast-charge your cell phone, pill and different USB Type C units

This is right as a spare or substitute in your present Type-C Charging cable. It is suitable with real Samsung Mains Chargers in your Type-C USB-C port powered units.
For New Samsung Type C Smartphones :- Compatible with New Samsung Galaxy A50, A50s and Also Compatible With all Samsung Type C Smartphones. Approx size of the cable is 1.2m
Pick Perfect Combinations – Our 100% Genuine Samsung Products imply you can cost your new cellphone with the equipment that have been made in your cellphone. No extra aftermarket cables and adaptors.
Our Promise – Fan Favourite 6 Month Warranty, 1 X Genuine Samsung Type C Cable, 1 X MOBACE 2 in 1 Stylus pen & Our Dedicated Customer Service Team
